lenders.loan_because: The little I do can make a huge difference to those in need.

lenders.name: Toni

lenders.occupational_info: I am a 32 year old wife and mother of 2 young boys.  After over 9 years of working in banking, I was diagnosed with terminal cancer and became a stay at home mother and wife.   Each day is a gift and helping someone else is the best gift you can ever give.

lenders.name: ann
lenders.loan_because: I still have hope.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm working in the operating room at a Combat Support Hospital in Baghdad.

lenders.name: Nicki
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Emily

lenders.name: Dominic

lenders.occupational_info: Thoughts & Doodles for the interwebz.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe in giving something back.  I am grateful for all that I have and I feel that it is only right to share it with those who need a helping hand.  Karma is a wonderful thing!

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my assets with people less fortunate than I have been
lenders.occupational_info: I design ecommerce website for a variety of clients throughout the world. I would initially like to offer my services to several people who are located anywhere, and create a website where they can market and sell their products (clothing especially) worldwide in a growing global online marketplace. If someone wants to sell their products online I would love to help them. I will donate the web domain name, hosting costs and create the site for them at no charge. Please email me if you are interested!

lenders.name: Jack Pearce
lenders.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Chuck

lenders.occupational_info: I am CFO to a small, privately owned manufacturing business.

lenders.name: Scott Scriver

lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer.  I have helped many start-up organizations with my skills.

lenders.loan_because: "It's ALL about giving back and making a difference, even if it is to ONE person"

lenders.name: Thomas

lenders.name: martyn

lenders.name: Gwen

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: Small things can have big results.

lenders.name: Elaine

lenders.name: Chastina

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: While I struggle with the interest rates these people are required to pay, in the end, I feel Kiva is truly trying to help.

lenders.name: Moritz

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: Lending is an extension of the work I have done assisting people to become more self-sufficient, through vocational counseling, and many types of volunteer work. When you help one person, you help everyone with whom they come in contact. It is personal, one to one, and it is also extended.
lenders.occupational_info: When I was a vocational counselor I worked at a school advising students who were taking classes for job skills and life skills. I have continued to help students, friends, and family when a need is brought to my attention, and I seek out opportunities to volunteer in the community among those who might find this helpful. (The photo above is of my mother and myself.)

lenders.name: Caroline & Colin

lenders.occupational_info: We started with nothing, worked very hard, saved and slowly my business grew, and can now support my family, and share a little wealth with others not so fortunate.

lenders.name: Louise and Nick
lenders.loan_because: we're all tied together in this world.  I'm helping a sister or brother whom I haven't ever met.

lenders.name: Stephen

lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Jennifer

lenders.name: MICHAEL
lenders.loan_because: I want to change someones life for the better
lenders.occupational_info: I work with troubled adolescents that may have been abused or addicted to drugs

lenders.name: Ignacio
lenders.loan_because: if you pick borrowers well you can just keep lending that $100  on and on to make a big difference to many - I like to pick those that want money for capital because that way they can be empowered and pay back. I avoid unhealthy things like lend to soda sellers

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because:
Its a great feeling to be able to learn of other peoples lives across the globe.  To know that in some small way I can give back for all I have recieved in my life.
This is a hand up, not a hand out.  How many of us can actually say we work as hard, under such circumstances?
lenders.occupational_info:
I assist in taking care of handicapped people.  Helping them to be as independent as possible in their daily lives.  
I have learned much more from them then they have from me!

lenders.name: swirkus
lenders.loan_because: I lend because it is a way to repay some of the generosity I have received throughout my life and also because I feel it is the least I can do considering I had the good fortune to be born in such a prosperous country.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: It helps
lenders.occupational_info: Numbers

lenders.name: Christin & Scott
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a positive difference in the lives of others.

lenders.name: Jenn
lenders.loan_because: People have helped me to achieve my goals, and I want to pay it forward.

lenders.name: Olatunji and Omara
lenders.loan_because: It's our own small way of reaching out in Christian love to those less fortunate than we are.

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: I heard Muhammad Yunus speak last year at Vanderbilt University and was greatly inspired. Months later I read about KIVA in Spirit Magazine on board a Southwest Airlines flight.  After reading this article I knew that a portion of my paycheck would go toward KIVA.  We are so fortunate in our country to have abundance and opportunity, it seems simple to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with other women in a large kitchen putting together meals for large gatherings, meetings, social events. We use fresh, in-season ingredients, and grow our own herbs that we use in the recipes. We put the prepared food in our cars and transport it to the event site.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: it's a good thing to do.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: it might help

lenders.name: Lynn

I know that hard work is not always enough and am glad to be a catalyst in change for people who dream of making their lives and their community better.
lenders.occupational_info: Manage projects for IT (computers) deployments globally.

lenders.name: Amye

lenders.name: Krishan
lenders.loan_because: This is my birthday present - I am now five and my parents would like me to help

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: As a former Peace Corps Volunteer, I know that relatively small amounts of money can make a difference in people's lives ...and we are, indeed, all connected.
lenders.occupational_info: As a psychologist, my job is to help people suffering from emotional distress.  I am married and have two grown sons.

lenders.name: Sandra

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I would hope someone would do the same for me.

lenders.name: Rebekkah
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself and recognize the difference between a "hand-up" and a "hand-out".
lenders.occupational_info: My company designs and builds web sites to help businesses reach customers in new and creative ways.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: We are blessed

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: I  want to do my small part to help others help themselves.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.occupation: I run an Office Services Company
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes, all one needs, is one small show of faith, and they become the person they were always meant to be. I loan because I'd like to think that I can help someone improve their lives on what I could have spent in ten minutes buying something that I don't even need. I do, becaues I can,  and thank the good Lord everyday, because it truely is better to give than to recieve. I'm not even remotely well off but compared to what I've seen I'm rich beyond words.
lenders.occupational_info: I handle many of the office needs of a small trucking firm that moves Mobile Homes across the USA. I do everything from billing to taking phone calls, optaining permits, and many other things that come along on any given day.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: corinne
lenders.loan_because: I am a believer in: "We must be the change we wish to see in the world" ~ Mahatma Gandhi
lenders.occupational_info:
In my work, I help people with physical disabilities become more functionally independent and capable in their daily living skills.  I work for a community based non-profit organization with the core philosophy and fervent mission to help adults and seniors with disability attain adequate medical care and support services for their well being; and, to be able to remain living sustainably in their own community.

In my lifepath, simply put: I am an ordinary person wanting to see our humanity live and breathe its sacred meaning, purpose, and belonging.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital.

lenders.occupational_info: i make coffee.

lenders.name: Carol and K9 Meg
lenders.loan_because: I believe in economies of scale,  or rather,  scaling economy for the betterment of people who are otherwise disenfranchised from large economic systems. It's grassroots "people to people" networking.
lenders.occupational_info:
Coffee roasting is my second career after 35 years as a wildlife /fisheries biologist. Roasting brings me closer to coffee producers, who are like the recipients of these microloans.  
Roasting  specialty coffees enables me to educate my coffee customers about the people to whom they owe their beverage .

lenders.name: Tiana
lenders.loan_because: I like knowing that I may have a small impact on someone's chance to improve their and their family's financial well-being.

lenders.name: Vicki
lenders.loan_because: My family is very blessed.  We have plenty of food and clothing,  and a cozy house.  It's good to share what we have.

lenders.name: Johnny
lenders.loan_because: things are meant to be better.
lenders.occupational_info: help people retire with integrity ~ retirement consulting.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I believe in starting small and building to bigger things. I believe in trust and in good nature. I believe that win/win relationships exist. I loan because it works.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a variety of fields including manufacturing and Environmental and Socially responsible media.

lenders.name: Georgina Kaye
lenders.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give. ~ Winston Churchill

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: I am making steps to become a better, truly happier person. Instead of giving to something short term like feeding starving children (which is very important!), I figured that I would contribute to something that makes progress (Once you give money to unicef or something, the children will still be hungry after your contribution is all spent.) I figured why not contribute to something that has the chance of making the world a more prosperous place?
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a working college student and barely making it! Even though I'm not super wealthy, I can contribute, because I know that not everyone has the same opportunities that I do.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: received a gift certificate

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Michael

lenders.occupational_info: My main gig is international business development, but I also build websites for individuals and small businesses.

lenders.occupational_info: I work for an insurance company in the Information Technology department.  My work consists of project planning and deployment, research and development, and supporting applications that I am responsible for.

lenders.name: suji

lenders.occupational_info: I design structures for large companies for special events.

lenders.name: Monique

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.occupational_info: Hello.

lenders.name: Nola

lenders.loan_because: It feels good to be able to help in any way possible to anyone who is trying to better their lives...more than likely...trying to better lives of loved ones more so than their own.
lenders.occupational_info: I bring medicines to facilities that care for the elderly when they can no longer care for themselves.

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: The world isn't changed for the better through committees, through imposing new regimes or systems. The world is changed by individuals acting out of compassion, and choosing to be generous.

lenders.name: Bob Bennett
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people and learn more about micro lending. Long term I want to create a platform similar to this one that not only provides the capital for micro businesses but also the education, training, and expertise for mirco businesses to be as successful as possible, in other words micro business building.
lenders.occupational_info: My business invests in small privately held businesses and acts as their coach and mentor to help them be more successful.

lenders.name: luwangula
lenders.loan_because: To put the knowledge acquired in school to use, and swim across the poverty/unemployment river
lenders.occupational_info:
I hold a bachelors degree in Food Science and Technology, obtained locally in my Countries best university.
Unemployment is a global issue. However, we acquire knowledge from institutions enough to self employ but without any capital

Am starting a number on personal businesses where I can employ others as a mitigation to fight poverty.

I intend to start poultry business on medium scale, as well as a wholesale/retail pharmacy in my home town. I need $3000 to succeed.

Any level of assistance is welcome.
God bless

lenders.name: Anton
lenders.occupational_info: Import-Export Company

 “Give someone a fish and you feed him for a day; Teach someone to fish and you help them to feed themselves for ever"

Go ahead and do it ! Now!

lenders.name: Saviz

lenders.name: Shane
lenders.loan_because: Sharing is important, in all sortsa ways.

lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.occupational_info: I create dreams for others - one of the most expensive item that anyone buys in their lifetime.  Our work in construction creates beautiful homes that people want to live in.

lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of corporate and accounting staff joined together to raise funds and awareness for Kiva. Our company owns and manages hotels in the USA.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: Micro loans are a great way to make a positive impact in other people's lives by helping people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a musician.  I compose music and play trombone.  I perform in many different clubs and parties and also teach music to teenagers.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Theo
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I care about others in need!

lenders.name: JANET
lenders.loan_because: I AM MORE BLESSED IF I BLESS SOMEONE ELSE, WE ARE ALL GODS FAMILY, WE SHARE THIS LOANED PLANET EARTH.
lenders.occupational_info: I GET TO TAKE CARE OF AND HELP PEOPLE THAT NEED ME. THERE IS ALWAYS NEW THINGS TO LEARN AND BE CHALLANGED BY.

lenders.name: Nisiewicz Family
lenders.loan_because:
We grow closer as a family when we help others. 

“If you can't feed a hundred people, then just feed one.” - Mother Teresa

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: it's better than losing money in the stock market or giving it to the government!
